item.title: Deployment Jenkins on Kubernetes Cluster
item.description: Jenkins Deployment Jenkins on Kubernetes Cluster deployment jenkins on k8s cluster The premise is that there is a load balancing 在k8s集群里面部署Jenkins，使用load balance暴露服务 ###jenkins-allinone.yaml ###PVC --- kind: PersistentVolumeClaim apiVersion: v1 metadata: name: jenkins-prd-lb-pvc namespace: kube-ops spec: storageClassName: "managed-nfs-storage"
